name: Mixifi
blurb: Find out how much a Spotify playlist or track would cost in iTunes by simply dragging and dropping the relevent tunes into Mixifi.

name: Emo Foodie
blurb: Track your personal emotions and feelings regarding what food you eat. Find a pattern and analyse your diet. Inteded for those with IBD related illnesses or those who are curious.

name: IsDogFriendly.com
blurb: What's the nearest location that allows dogs in? A website and app to track where you might go in a local area or even on holiday that will allow your dog to join.
